mapper.sql: SELECT DbT3002.* from rgdb."DbT3002KyodoShoriyoJukyushaIdoKihonSofu" as DbT3002 where DbT3002."rirekiNo" = (select max(A."rirekiNo") from rgdb."DbT3002KyodoShoriyoJukyushaIdoKihonSofu" as A WHERE DbT3002."hiHokenshaNo" = A."hiHokenshaNo" and DbT3002."idoYMD" = A."idoYMD" ) and DbT3002."hiHokenshaNo" = #{被保険者番号} and DbT3002."idoYMD"<= #{異動日To} and DbT3002."logicalDeletedFlag"= false order by DbT3002."idoYMD" DESC
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM rgdb."DbV1001HihokenshaDaicho" AS DbV1001 INNER JOIN AS "ShikibetsuTaisho" ON DbV1001."shikibetsuCode" = "ShikibetsuTaisho"."shikibetsuCode" WHERE DbV1001."hihokenshaNo" = #{被保険者番号}
